subject: Order (plus x pedals)
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Danny thompson,  We will ship your items separately because their packaging cannot be combined. Additionally, the processing of your order has been affected by a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a little more patience. Thank you very much for your understanding and support.

Hi Danny thompson,    As you did not provide an email address, you did not receive the order confirmation and dispatch notification. We have added this email address for you to receive subsequent notifications. Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047095995538
